document.full_text: over the last 25 years, there has been almost nothing that the mets have done better than the yankees. yet one small item cropped up after the mets decided not to re-sign the left-handed reliever pedro feliciano and allowed the yankees to do so instead.
document.title: cashman says feliciano was 'abused' by mets
lines_and_colors: over the last 25 years, there has been almost nothing that the mets have done better than the yankees. yet one small item cropped up after the mets decided not to re-sign the left-handed reliever pedro feliciano and allowed the yankees to do so instead.
